item.title: Scalable AI
item.description: A project made in 7 days ðŸ”—Back in May 2022 I submitted Autopanic to a local contest, which I earned third place. The prize comes with a guaranteed coverage by biggest local gaming news site so not bad. But I digress. After submission. I decided to take a break and play this “Vampire Survivor” everyone is crazy about, and oh boy, ain’t it some of the best balancing I’ve ever seen.
